text: Navi, who claims to be the world ’ s number one Michael Jackson impersonator, stars in Lifetime ’ s movie called “ Michael Jackson : Searching for Neverland, ” which premiered on May 29. This was Navi ’ s acting debut, but he has a long affinity to the king of pop. Navi has been performing as MJ for over 20 years and also worked with the artist as his decoy and was the only impersonator to be invited to Neverland Ranch on the pop icon ’ s 45th birthday.
